attributes.action: Give Medical/Nursing Students placement hours if COVID 19 takes control
attributes.additional_details: We want placement hours to be signed off if it comes to us being unable to attend placement either due to being told to self-isolate due to symptoms, or if our team that we are assigned to at the time are told to close or work from home etc. COVID-19 is currently out of our control, we do not get paid for placement, and if doctors/nurses/OT’s have to self isolate or their teams close, they get statutory sick pay. Therefore I think it’s only fair that we get our hours signed off as an equivalent.
attributes.background: Nursing/Medical Students have to do a certain number of placement hours to qualify, however in the future it may be recommended for some teams to work from home and do minimal/emergency contact with patients. Where does this leave well students who are expected to make hours up once COVID clears?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This is a matter for the regulatory bodies, such as the NMC, who are responsible for the qualifications.
